message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses lower. Would you consider selling it to me for $85?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, would you be open to selling the product for $87?
